column3: German bikepacker in Rio. Bad language barrier; still learning multipitch and is very sketchy.
Also super nice like her husband JC
Super strong trans woman. Put her on more 10s if she comes back
Spreading Bob’s ashes on the summit. Hawker
Traded me his Freino as a tip!
Two children Grey and Parker. They all climb decently hard, 9’s and 10’s are on the table.
